attributes.action: Help the homeless during the pandemic. They are being left behind.
attributes.additional_details: Bring in emergency shelter. Make empty hotels shelters, get them food, treat them as human beings!
attributes.background: I have seen a number of homeless. Went in to get them a coffee and when I came back they must have been moved on. Is anyone, amongst the panic buying and toilet paper hoarding given a single thought to those living on the street, with no resources, no food, no warmth and no help.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302485

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
